name: MARGHERITA
description: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping

name: Cheese Pizza
description: A simple yet delicious margherita pizza with a tangy, cheesy topping.

name: Buffalo Pizza
description: A spicy and tangy pizza topped with buffalo chicken, onions, and mozzarella cheese for a bold flavor experience.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Smoky BBQ sauce with tender chicken, grilled mushrooms, black olives, and onions, topped with a BBQ glaze.

name: Meat Pizza
description: A meat lover's delight, with BBQ chicken, pepperoni, grilled mushrooms, and a layer of melted cheese.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A tropical twist with pineapple chunks, barbecue chicken, mushrooms, and green onions.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: An overload of fresh vegetables including crisp capsicum, mushrooms, and tomatoes, served on a cheesy base.

name: Chicken Pepperoni Pizza
description: The classic American favorite with savory chicken pepperoni and extra cheese.

name: Chicken Supreme
description: Loaded with double pepper barbecue chicken, peri-peri chicken, and grilled chicken rashers for a supreme flavor.

name: Normal Soda
description: A refreshing soda to complement any meal.

name: Light Soda
description: A light, refreshing soda for a crisp and subtle taste.

name: Lemon Tea
description: A zesty lemon tea, perfect for quenching your thirst.

name: Milkshake
description: A creamy milkshake, perfect to pair with your meal.

name: Strawberry Pie
description: A sweet and tangy strawberry pie with a flaky crust.

name: Special Cupcake
description: A delightful cupcake with a sweet and creamy filling.

name: Coconut Icecream
description: A rich coconut ice cream with a tropical flavor.

name: Berries Icecream
description: A creamy ice cream bursting with the sweet and tangy flavor of mixed berries.
